page.title: 17RIDING STABLES
page.content: Downs House Riding Stables are well known in the Dunstable area. It has been in operation for 14 years and Mrs. Dyke, the owner, says they will still be in business in many years to come. During the week 14 people are employed to attend to the ten acres of land 26 ponnies owned by the stables and those privately owned. These have to be fed watered and mucked every day. The busiest day of the week is Saturday when lots of people come to the stables to ride but this number drops in winter.
